# makeMessage(_:)

**Type Method**

Converts a posted notification into this asynchronous message type for any observers.

## Declaration

```swift
static func makeMessage(_ notification: Notification) -> Self?
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: The posted [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Notification].

## Return Value

The converted `AsyncMessage`, or `nil` if conversion is not possible.

## Discussion

To implement this method in your own `AsyncMessage` conformance, retrieve values from the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Notification]’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Notification/userInfo] and set them as properties on the message.

## Converting between messages and notifications

- **makeNotification(_:)**: Converts a posted asynchronous message into a notification for any observers.
